game.name: Valentines Mahjong
game.description: Valentines Mahjong is a great HTML 5 game. Do you love valentine and mahjong? Then you need to play this game because this game is a combo of love and Mahjong! Can you match all the right hearts with each other? Be aware of the time, otherwise some hearts will be broken..
game.metaTitle: Valentines Mahjong, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Valentines Mahjong at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Valentines Mahjong Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE SAME IMAGES TO MAKE THE MATCH
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE ON THE SAME IMAGES TO MAKE THE MATCH
